name: Jarsath Wastes
notes: An unforgiving wasteland, Jarsath Wastes is the central point in the struggle between the Sebilissian Empire and the Ring of Scale. The Shipyards of Ganak, a large iksar port outpost, can be found here, as well as the mighty Ganak's Battlement. The dragons claim the Skyfire Mountains as their own, and will viciously defend their territory from all intruders.
